112.content: Chloe uses her very good looks to attract ticklish victims. She is a very cute brunette with deep brown eyes and soft tan skin. She typically finds her victims at music festivals before luring them back to a hidden area and tickling them senseless for days. Often to the point of insanity. When she releases her victims they are often put in mental hospitals. But one man thinks he can turn the tables
112.title: Chloe the Serial Tickler

choices: Josh falls prey to Chloe's charms
1121.content:
Josh JD heard about Chloe, the mysterious girl in his neighborhood who had literally driven both boys and girls who went after her to insanity, without any repercussions from the authorities. He had wanted nothing to do with her, despite how pretty she was, until he heard that her strange method of torture was...tickling? Josh hadn't been tickled in years since his babysitter had pinned him down and tickled his feet, and he was sure he's grown out of that by now. Also, he really needed a new GF since his last one dumped him.

Josh walked up to the pop rock concert and soon spotted Chloe hanging around casually near the back of the crowd. She was wearing a short denim mini skirt and a shoulderless white too that complemented her soft tan skin. She looked so hot that he found himself walking right on up to her.
1121.title: Josh's escape

choices: Just an overconfident boy (about to get the tickling of his life)
A guy with a plan to get payback on this serial tickler
Just as much of a freak as Chloe
11211.content: Josh approached Chloe without fear, after all he was...
11211.title: Josh falls prey to Chloe's charms

125.content:
Here's a couple more, these two are Elves

1. Marion the Elf Princess
Marion is a cute elf girl born into a royal family. She's dozens of years old, but appears as a teenager to other elves, who age at a very slow rate. Marion's older, less ticklish sister, Princess Priscilla, will be the future queen, so Princess Marion is free to live an easy life with no real responsibilities at all, so naturally her family loves to annoy her by tickling her. Princess Marion is very ticklish, especially on her long pointy ears, her tummy, and her small breasts (older sister Priscilla has bigger breasts and Marion is slightly jealous of them). Marion is tall, slender, and has long blonde hair. She typically wears a cute dress and a hat.

2. Melanie the Slave Girl
Melanie (often shortened to Mel) is a cute little elf slave. She is over 30 in years, but appears as a kid, thanks to the fact that elves age so slowly. Mel was sold into slavery by her mother to pay off a debt, although she still gets to visit her family sometimes. Mel's owners are an elf couple (Master Archie and Mistress Mia) skilled in magic who use her as a toy to entertain themselves. They cast spells on little Melanie to make her more ticklish or to conjure feathers and hands out of thin air. Melanie is useless for any kind of actual slave work, being a kid and all, so she mostly sits around the mansion until Master Archie or Mistress Mia come by to tickle or humiliate her for fun. Despite this, Melanie actually likes living with them because she came from a dirt-poor family and enjoys living n luxury, even if it means being tied up and tickled all the time. Melanie is short, with slightly tan skin and white hair. She is skinny to the point that she appears underfed. She tires easily and has no physical stamina at all. Melanie has been enchanted with an aura that makes her very, very ticklish all over her body, but her most sensitive spots are her ears, her armpits, and her sides. Melanie isn't allowed to wear much clothing, because more exposed skin means more body to tickle, so her typical outfit is nothing more than her slave collar, a pair of panties, and a training bra.
125.title: More

choices: Mia turns the lower half of her body into tickle tentacles to tickle Melanie
Mia enchants Melanie's bra to make it feel like her own clothes are tickling her
Mia summons a Tickle Elemental from the Ether and Melanie must fight it
1252.content:
Melanie was in the mansion drowsily reading a book about cabbage farming from Master Archie's bookshelf. Her collar was tied to a post on the wall so she couldn't run away while her owners were out (not like she'd want to) and her raggedy slave panties were slightly disheveled looking, riding up to give the little elf girl a wedgie. Outside, the tired grunting of slave workers on the plantation could be heard, strong elf men and women out in the sun, picking cotton and working the magical machines needed for piking out the seeds. Melanie let out a low yawn, scratched her butt, and picked at her wedgie, finding the panties just a tad too tight on her. She was about to close her eyes when her owners, Master Archie and Mistress Mia came in.
"Oh! Good afternoon, Masters!" Melanie said.
She stood up to bow to her owners, but the leash on her collar got caught on a corner of the bookshelf and choked her. Melanie coughed and lost her balance. She fell flat on her face with a humiliating thud. Archie and Mia laughed at her.
"Oh, that is classic. Good afternoon, Melanie. Guess what? I learned a new magic spell today! I'm going to test it out on you." Mistress Mia said.
Melanie gulped.

What sort of spell did Mia have in store for our young heroine?
1252.title: Melanie the slave

12522.content:
"This spell will transfer the content of any book directly into your brain. It should feel like you were reading the whole book in a few seconds." Melanie's stared at her mistress. She was happy reading a book page by page. Having learned from the past she kept her mouth shut and waited. Archie picked two books from the bookshelf and handed them to the slave elf who could not help but ask "Two at the same time?" "Yes, to keep the balance. Stretch your arms away from your body and hold them."

The slave girl lamely raised her ams. Holding the books with arms stretched drained her strength but she knew that she simply had to comply. Mistress Mia held her hands level, fingers pointed towards the slave elf who stood in her training bra and panties, and took a deep breath. Archie was standing next to her, beaming. Melanie heard her mistress say. "Litterae eo cerebrum, textum titillare". Initially the little slave girl thought that the books were coming to life in her hands but maybe it was an imagination.

But the sudden sensation of the fabric of her training bra moving over her delicate pale skin was no imagination. "Teeheee. Tehehehehe. That tickles." She shimmied but the feeling only got more intense. "Now, what is the content of the book in your left hand. Can you say?" Mistress Mia was impatient.
Poor Melanie did...
12522.title: Mia enchants Melanie's bra to make it feel ...

12523.content:
Archie went and unlocked Melanie's collar from the leash, letting the little girl free. Mia began chanting a spell.
"Wha... what's going on?" Melanie nervously said.
Archie only smirked and handed her a broomstick.
"You'll need this, little one." He said.
A light began to glow and a circle of summoning appeared in the air. Out of the circle, a strange being came forth. It was a bird-like creature, covered in feathers with an orange and black spotted pattern, much like a hyena/bird hybrid. It had long spindly arms with long delicate fingers underneath its wings. Its head was a single huge eyeball with a large dog-like muzzle. It was a tickle elemental, a magical being made of pure tickle energy. It subsisted upon tickling and lived only to tickle. The elemental let out a soft giggle.
"Eek! What is that thing?" Melanie said, clutching her broomstick.
"Doesn't matter, kiddo. You have to fight it, and if you don't win you get thrown in the basement dungeon!" Mia said, with an evil grin on her face.
This meant Melanie probably wouldn't get fed dinner and be locked in some sort of tickle-torture device for hours on end if she didn't win. The skinny little elf girl was already hungry and the thought of missing dinner made her heart sink. There was no way she would let the Tickle Elemental win.

Melanie let out her fiercest battle cry (which was more like a girlish wail since she was such a weak and wimpy little girl) and charged forward. With all her strength, she bopped the Tickle Elemental on the head with her broomstick. The Tickle Elemental did not seem to feel any sort of pain at all. Melanie wouldn't give up easily, though. The little elf girl swung her broomstick again... only for it to be caught by the Tickle Elemental's long spindly arms!
"Kekekekek!" The Tickle Elemental said.
It forcefully ripped the broomstick from Melanie's grip, leaving the little girl defenseless. Melanie had the heart of a warrior, and used her fists to punch at the Tickle Elemental's body. Unfortunately for her, she was a weak little kid and the Tickle Elemental had more strength in its arm than she had in her entire body. The Tickle Elemental slammed its chest against Melanie, knocking her down. It then stood its bird-like legs atop Melanie's knees and held the little girl's hands down with its arms. Only now did Melanie realize how hopeless this fight was for her. Archie and Mia pointed and laughed at her devilishly. Melanie closed her eyes, trying to think of a way out, but coming up blank.

The Tickle Elemental moves its feathery wings toward Melanie's mostly exposed nubile young body. Where does Melanie get tickled?
12523.title: Mia summons a Tickle Elemental from the Ether

131.content:
Tickle mites are too small to be seen by the naked eye. But under a microscope they are quite strange. They are bright pink and elongated, with feathery appendages. Their mouth is large and circular with little teeth surrounding it.

Tickle mites like to hide in anything cloth and multiply extremely quickly. once on is spread to something it only takes hours for their to be thousands of them and a few more for there to be millions. They have been found in seats, clothing, blankets, sheets, mattresses, and anything else cloth, but that Is not the only place they reside. Once they find a host they can hide in there eyelashes, hair, under their nails, even on their skin. They are virtually impossible to get rid of.

Tickle mites love to tickle humans. They do this through excreting chemicals that excite the nervous system and either using their own feathery appendages of the microscopic fibers hanging off of clothing to tickle their victim senseless. They like to use the clothing though, as they find it more affective.

Once they find a victim they wait till they have multiplied sufficiently and are ready to strike. Then they tighten the holes in the clothing item so it is virtually impossible to get off, so they have their tool and strike. They usually only tickle their victim for a few hours but are near impossible to get rid of once someone has them and typically tickle their victims 2-3 times a day.

People with tickle mites will not only experience tickling from the mites but the chemicals have a prolonged affect that makes them increasingly more ticklish the longer they have them, so they commonly become victims to ticklers around the world, but they get their karma as this is often how they are spread.
131.title: Tickle mites

1311.content:
"You are telling me you are being TICKLED by your clothes, you are so full of shit Ben!" Olivia teased.

"No no! I am serious! I can't pull them off and it tickles like hell for hours!" Ben stammered

Ben was Olivia's friend who she had always thought was kind of cute, so she took this opportunity to tease him and tickle him a little bit."Oh no Ben!" Olivia mocked, "I think your socks are coming to get you!" She latched onto his bare feet and pulled them onto the couch locking them between her strong, dancer legs.

"No... Olivia please don't. Ever since it started I've been way more tickli-"

"Oh my god, you are such a baby!" She dug into his soles with her well manicured, pink fingernails. He bucked like crazy and squirmed as hard as he could to get away. "Oh no, is the little boy ticklish?" She continued her. assault on his feet until she was confident he was weak enough and climbed on top of him. While he was catching his breath she snaked her hands under his shirt and tickled his belly and ribs. He screamed and chortled but she refused to stop. He passed out within five minutes.

On the walk home Olivia reflected on the night. She thought maybe that she was a little hard on him. Maybe he needed help, maybe he was schizophrenic and really thought that was happening to him. She really wished she at least hadn't made him pass out so he could've walked her home. The city streets were no place for an attractive girl like her to walk alone and she looked extra pretty tonight.

She had just came from a dance competition before she went to Ben's apartment. She was wearing a pair of black booty shorts and tights but had switched out her crop top for a tight pink sweater. She had long blonde hair and dazzling hazel eyes. She was short but had a dancers body. Most men swooned over her.

Olivia arrived at her apartment and kicked off her boots before laying on her bed. She decided to take her sweater off before watching Netflix. But she found that they were stuck on her body, no matter how hard she pulled at her clothes nothing would come off, not even her tights. She played down on the couch trying to figure out what was happening, but by the time she remembered what Ben had told her, it was too late.

"Oh no!" She felt a light tingle in her left foot.
1311.title: Olivia's karma

1351.content:
Catgirls are normally found around forests and other jungle like areas. From a distance they seem human but you'd see the difference when you get closer. Despite the similarities to people, the tail, cat ears and paws definitely give them away. They usually pounce on unsuspecting people from behind and tickling their upper body and using their tongue on their feet as well. While they may be skilled tickler, they are ticklish themselves. Their bellies are a huge weak spot for them as well as their feet.

A few fingers in their armpits will generate a lot of laughs but their tails will drive them wild with laughter. They are incredibly friendly although once they see you as a tickle target, run. They're incredibly fast, especially in jungle areas. However, they are a little too playful for their own good. The catgirls love being tickled and will usually look for ticklish situations to get involved in.
1351.title: Catgirl

142.content:
The Tickle Trivia Game is a game designed to take the tickle fight to an even playing field. It consists of magnetic cuffs, a magnetic waistband, a pair of magnetic stocks with magnetic toe rings, an electronicly impulsed tight sweater, and electronically impulsed leggings for each player. Both players have to put on and sync up the devices before the game begins.

There is also four buttons on the waistband, these can be used to choose categories, answer questions, and make wagers for DOUBLE TICKLE rounds. When a question is asked the first player buzzing in gets to answer. If they answer correctly the punishment is inflicted on their opponent, but if incorrect they endure the punishment.

The punishment is decided by what row the question is from, 1 through 5. The punishment is the duration of 15 seconds times the row squared and affects the row's amount of regions decided by the opponent. The regions are feet, legs, hips and butt, belly, and ribs and armpits.

Once a player's punishment is decided the magnetic cuffs repel from each other, the stocks, and the waist band to leave the victim helpless, the stocks are constantly on but the toe rings stretch the feet and pull the toes apart. If the feet are to be tickled twenty appendages come out and attack the feet viciously including pinwheels, feathers, rotator brushes, and vibrators. If the legs are to be tickled, the leggings are manipulated to squeeze the inner thighs and above the knees while making lighter sensations as though someone is running their fingers across them or vibrating them all throughout the legs. If the hips and butt are chosen then the leggings knee the hipbone and cause lighter, feathery sensations in the but and privates. If the belly is chosen The sweater acts similarly to the leggings, combining the squeezing and pinching with light feathery sensations, but also contains a feathery, vibrating appendage that sticks into the bellybutton. If ribs and armpits are chosen the sweater kneads and pinches the ribs while using lighter sensations on the armpits and chest.

When asked a DOUBLE TICKLE question, the players wager somewhere between one to five and then the loser gets the numbers in additions to the opponents numbers. This means that the loser can be tickled for up to twenty five minutes! Also if the number is greater than five the amount of areas is cannot account for that, so the opponent can bank those for future questions. Even though it is focused on tickle punishment, score is still kept in Jeopardy style and a winner is chosen. The winner is unlocked while the opponent is still locked in position for the greatest amount of time the winner had to endure.
142.title: Tickle Trivia Game

145.content: Further device: Tickle Twister? or another device
145.title: More

1451.content:
Tickle Twister is basically the traditional Twister game, played in teams and with a twist. A team consists of two players. For each player on the Twister pad his/her team mate stands next to it, equipped with a long flexible rod with a stiff feather mounted on the top. With this he tickles a predetermined opponent until either the opponent or his team mate on the field fail to hold to their spots.

Equipment:
- Twister pad and wheel
- For each player standing next to the pad, a long flexible rod with a stiff feather mounted on top; flexible that it does not hurt when he accidentally pokes with it. You can build it yourself from a branch of a bush, feather and tape.

Rules:
- Two players per team, one on the pad, the other is the Tickler
- If more than two teams play, it has to be agreed who tickles whom
- only one tickler per player on the pad
- Twister rules apply
- Clothing: T-Shirt or top with a wide opening at the armpits and shorts for ballpark game, not too tight on the thighs. Nothing else. T-Shirt has to hang loose.
- Tickling is allowed anywhere and anytime. Keep away from the eyes.
- Repeated poking with the rod or whipping or pushing leads to disqualification
- Both members of the team losing get a tickling punishment by all other players with the same equipment while doing a back bend or a bridge on the pad for one minute.
- Advanced players may adjust as they please.

Tips:
- tickle where the skin is stretched
- face excluding eyes makes concentrating much harder
- spots below clothes may be rewarding, depending on situation
- when in doubt go for ears, nose, hips or the inner thighs. Feet may work, depending on position.
- because of the flexibility of the rod you may need some practice before you get the feather moving they way you want it
- for the players on the pad focus on your task and endure it. Your problem.
1451.title: Tickle Twister

14511.content: Tickle Twister stories and alternative versions of that game.
14511.title: Sub Versions of Tickle Twister

145111.content:
First story: the Friday night sleepover
Further stories
145111.title: Stories

1451111.content:
Amanda's invitation for her Friday night sleepover included a list of required items to bring along. While some of them could be considered usual for such event with an eleven year old host, others were more peculiar. An old T-shirt for example and a certain type of shorts made some guests assume that they would do something like a dance performance.

The host and her family including her older brother helped her prepare the house, food and games. They had agreed that the parents would visit the sick grandfather and would not return until Sunday, on the condition that her older brother and a girl from the neighborhood would keep an eye on the girls only event. James, who was sixteen, had to study for exams and would retire to the basement to have it quiet.

Unusual for Amanda she had spent more time in her room than usual. Her mother was proud of the girl working on her room decoration with a number of long branches and a flurry of feathers she had bought on a garage sale. Who sold feathers, but people did.

Later in the afternoon the guests arrived. Sarah and Letitia were the same age as Amanda while Lea was a year younger. Her neighbor Tory was twelve but still acted as silly as Lea did, most of the time. Amanda's mother had insisted to invite Curley, the very shy girl from next door who was ten. Nobody called her Juliet as was her proper name. Curley was more appropriate given her hair style, and because she accepted that name silently. Now all five guests were having juice and cake, talking a lot while munching. The door bell rung again. Kathy entered the house and waved hello to the girls. Kathy was the paid babysitter who would stay over night. James was occupied with his studies and had a girlfriend, so Kathy would not have to fend off a boy while keeping six girls under control.

When they retired to Amanda's room upstairs Kathy stayed in the living room and took her e-reader. She did not notice that Amanda quietly came back and downstairs and opened the front door. Three pairs of feet on socks were silently traipsing up the stairs. It was not a girls only party any more. When Josh and Greg entered the room smiling some of the girls blushed. They had not known about this surprise until five minutes ago.
1451111.title: Friday night sleepover

14512.content:
Get somesmall rough stones and tie fishing line around them. Leave a few inches of line free. Make ice cubes from water and sink the stones before you put it into the freezer. Use lemonade or juice instead to add more fun.

When frozen solid extract ice cubes and tie the line to the top of the rods. Make sure the ice cubes are hanging a few inches below the tip. Then proceed with the game. Tickle the person on the grid with the dangling ice cube. As the game progresses dripping cold water spices it up. You can let it drip into places you cannot get to directly with the cube...

Tickling with a dangling ice cube is funny and safe because it is both a soft touch and cold, but it does not make frostbites on the skin. But beware. People playing Tickle Ice Cube Challenge might scream much louder compared to the feather version.

For beginners, draw the ice cube with your rod over long stretches of bare skin. Legs and arms are easiest, the neck is a very good spot to soften a player. Once you have gotten more experience, make the ice cube swing to touch places the player assumed that were safe, like under the T-shirt if it hangs loose.

The players who have not read this instruction will only realise later in the game that they have signed up for more than they bargained. Once a player is tilted to his back with his hands resting behind him (her), the ice cube can be lowered into the cleavage. If the butt is low try dangling it below the hem of the shorts. At least the cold water will follow gravity.

If you have used juice the winning team might be allowed to lick it from the skin of the losers...later in the evening.
14512.title: Tickle Ice Cube Challenge

152.content:
The organ of these cursed tights is unknown. They appear to be normal tights of a very light pink color with a pattern of white feathers. The only initial difference between the Tickle Tights and any other pair of tights is they have toes. The victim will mysteriously find these tights in their own closet and feel the need to wear them as soon as they see them.

Once the tights are put on, they cannot be taken off. They are charmed to stay on that persons body until death, at which point they will vanish and appear in a different closet. The effects of the tights do not actually tickle the victim but exponentially increase their ticklishness everywhere the tights are touching. Ticklishness doubles every hour. So, in the beginning the victim may just feel a bit more sensitive or stifle a giggle slipping on their shoes. But in three hours the ticklishness is noticeable for sure. They will have become eight times as ticklish and will be aware of the difference because this is the point where most people's feet brushing against anything, including the insides of their shoes will tickle them. In another hour they will not be able to brush anything against their legs without giggling, the only way to keep the sensations away is to keep their lower body motionless. In another hour they are 32x as ticklish and their own body's circulatory system will cause enough movement to tickle them and giggle slightly, and as soon as the victim twitches they find themselves in a chain reaction of hysteria. The tickling grows worse and worse until in three more hours the victim is 248x as ticklish and the air molecules themselves tickle them. By this point the victim is in and out of consciousness never able to get a word out. Usual by 17 hours when the victim is 131,072x as ticklish their brain is fried by ticklish sensations and they die, but maybe medical technology can find another way...
152.title: Tickle Tights

info.description: This is a place to put tickling ideas fallowed by a short story involving it
